Description:
Join Cognizant as we showcase an impactful responsible AI (RAI) approach, focused on Agentic RAI governance. This session highlights our alignment with Copilot AI and collaboration with Microsoft RAI experts. Discover how our innovative strategies and partnerships are driving growth and improving customer engagement. Donâ€™t miss this opportunity to learn about the latest advancements in AI governance and how they can benefit your organization.
